onAnimationResume(android.animation.Anim.Description: Notifies that the animation was resumed, after being previously paused.

onAnimationPause(android.animation.Anima.Description: Notifies that the animation was paused.

ClassDesc: A pause listener receives notifications from an animation when the animation is @B_android#animation#Animator#pause_E@ or @B_android#animation#Animator#resume_E@.
